title: M2: Lexical ambiguity
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: elementary. * SUPERVISION: self-assessment. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 2 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: English. * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: To adapt this exercise to other languages, simply replace "shower" in the example with a word form in your language that has two or more different meanings. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: Beginner students can be reminded that the lexical ambiguity in the current example is due to homography.
